column5: Thought you might wanna see some great action in Nova Scotia  Ver very cool Click on the videos http://www.bluesharkcharters.com/Multimedia.htm
I spoke to that guy last year at the fishing show.  I never got around to booking a trip.  Looks like fun though

Hi All, That's my buddy Capt Art. He is the man! A day with him is awesome! If you want a trip of a lifetime book a trip with Art and you will freak. I will be back there for sure this year. Some of you may have seen the shark video we sent out earler this year that was shot with Art. For those who did not see it it's on my site. If you want to talk to Art he will be down at the Sportsmens Show in the Shimano booth.  Dave Mercer www.factsoffishing.com
Marc that was great  I have never seen a shark jump that high out of the water.Makes Muskie fishing look tame.But how would I know I am yet to catch my first Muskie.
Looks like a good time, I'll be moving near Halifax in August, maybe i'll have to make a shark fishing trip!

Van Halen Shark Fishing - Cool.  Thanks Mark.  Did you see the other thread by Nelly  Guns N Roses Muskie Hunting  Apparently 70's rock music makes fishing better  Just kidding.  That was neat.  I'd love to try it.  Joey

Halifax is around the same distance as Florida for me so........it would be a tough decision. He's a one of a kind guide out there though, looks like fun, just don't get your hand bit off like that shark angler on CNN yesterday.
